definition: to accompany/to keep sb company/to assist/old variant of 賠|赔[pei2]

sentences.english: We regret we cannot find any market for this write-up.
sentences.chinese: 我們很陪罪不能爲此項商品找到銷路。

definition: to offer an apology/to make amends
a person of great moral stature does not remember the offenses committed by one of low moral stature

definition: to confess one's fault/to accept one's punishment
to bow respectfully with clasped hands/to beg humbly
to beg for mercy/to ask for forgiveness

uncle (affectionate name for a friend older than one's father)/old friend
to calm down/to quell one's anger
